If you: Have a PayNow account linked to your NRIC
How to receive the payout: Cash automatically credited into the PayNow-NRIC linked bank account.
context: silver-support-scheme ComCare Long Term Assistance Scheme

If you: Don't have a PayNow account linked to your NRIC but have previously provided your DBS/POSB, OCBC or UOB bank account number to the Government
How to receive the payout: Cash automatically credited to the known bank account.
context: silver-support-scheme ComCare Long Term Assistance Scheme

If you: Don't have a PayNow account linked to your NRIC and have not provided a bank account to the Government
How to receive the payout: Cash will be credited to you via GovCash.
context: silver-support-scheme ComCare Long Term Assistance Scheme
